data.title: Is Visa Stock a Buy After Rising 34% in 2019?
data.text: The payment space is growing quickly, and Visa looks like the front-runner.

data.title: 4 Payment Stocks Poised to Retain Positive Trend in 2H19
data.text: Banking on strong retail sales and the use of cutting-edge technology, these four stocks should be on your watch list for 2H19.
